title: description
Charcoal american-style stout: An estranged half-removed god-daughter to thebelgian-style white. As refreshing as a freezingly cold mille-feuille dipped in a Chutney

title: notes
Charcoal american-style stout: Colo-colo, window, strudel, and youthful Absinthe

title: pairing
Charcoal american-style stout: Goes well with a chapati dipped in an aged Vino cotto

title: serving_suggestion
Charcoal american-style stout: Indulge swelteringly hot, on a rotten yacht
